name: Country Flag Icons
description:
Figma template/library with graphical assets, color styles & tokens of country flag.

The whole template is built with the purpose of you being able to easily extend your ongoing graphical work.


Plugins Used

  • Unsplash
  • Design System Organiser
  • Figma Tokens
  • Figma Finder
  • SkewDat


Flags included

Africa

Asia

Europe

North America

South America

Oceania

Antartica
